Text: Import the good only if there is a matching storage, workplace or construction site demand.
Always import the good to the District Crossing even if there is no matching storage, workplace or construction site demand.
Import enabled by storage, workplace or construction site demand.
Comment: The text shown on a good's tooltip when it is importable. "Storage workplace or construction site demand" should be the same as in Distribution.ImportAuto.Description

Text: Import blocked by the lack of storage, workplace and construction site demand in this district.
Comment: The text shown on a good's tooltip when it is not importable. "Storage workplace and construction site demand" should be the same as in Distribution.ImportAuto.Description
